text: mA$ pratiqShThAM ga#maya praqjayA# paqSuBi#H saqha punaqrmA&& vi#SatAd-raqyiriti# praqjayaiqvaina#M paqSuBI# raqyyAM prati# ShThApayati praqjAvA$n paSuqmAn ra#yiqmAn Ba#vatiq ya EqvaM ~MvEdaq tAmaqgnIdhE# vA braqhmaNE# vAq hOtrE# vOdgAqtrE vA$&ddhvaqryavE# vA dadyAth saqhasra#masyaq sA daqttA Ba#vati saqhasra#masyaq prati#gRuhItaM Bavatiq yastAmavi#dvAn - [  ] 30
